short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A reminder to stand up and stretch your legs for one minute every hour.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sitting at your desk all day can take its toll, this extension will remind you to get up and stretch your legs for one minute of every hour.

1: Install 
2: Pin to toolbar
3: Click icon then press start
